name: Krafts
description:
Welcome to Krafts!

Ever feel like you need a break from your busy life, or you simply want to remember what it felt like to be in kindergarten again? 

Well in Krafts you can do all this and more! A game powered by YOUR imagination and creativity! 

Make anything and everything, but don't forget to join it all together with some glue! 

And afterwards, share your awesome creation by saving and downloading a picture of it. Who knows, maybe your parents will even hang it on the fridge!

Feel Free to Comment and Share Your Creations!

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021!
